snippet: White House officials said President Obama, as a law student, lived briefly with his father’s half brother, contradicting their statement in 2011, after the uncle was charged with drunken driving.
abstract: White House officials, changing their account, say Pres Obama has indeed met his father's half-brother, Onyango Obama, who faced deportation to Kenya after a drunken-driving arrest in 2011.
lead_paragraph: White House officials said President Obama, as a law student, lived briefly with his father’s half brother, contradicting their statement in 2011, after the uncle was charged with drunken driving.

headline.main: In Reversal, White House Says Obama Did Meet Uncle
headline.print_headline: In Reversal, White House Says Obama Did Meet Uncle
